original_title: Hellooo George from Wherever You Are! A Wink to the Sky
overview: Film trailer made for FNC festival of Montreal in hommage to my dear friend George Kuchar. George had just passed away so I gathered my New York team who had known him with me in NYC and I shot 24 frames of each of them in a dance of joy and celebration to celebrate George in all his states.
title: Hellooo George from Wherever You Are! A Wink to the Sky
